greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A001065(A252463(n)).
comment: Also for n > 1, sum of A318889(x) for all x encountered when map x -> A252463(x) is iterated, starting from x = A252463(n), until 1 is reached.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
program: A064989(n) = {my(f); f = factor(n); if((n>1 && f[1,1]==2), f[1,2] = 0); for (i=1, #f~, f[i,1] = precprime(f[i,1]-1)); factorback(f)};
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 22 2018
